name: Aziende Industriali di Lugano (AIL) SA
customer_prompt:
## AIL-Specific Instructions

- The invoices are in Italian
- Store the Invoice Number WITHOUT dots. GOOD: 10267775 BAD: 10.267.7775

name: BKW Energie AG
customer_prompt:
## BKW-Specific Instructions

- The invoices are in German
### Exclusions
- Skip all lines marked as "verrechnungsfrei"
- Abgaben are NOT part of the "Rest" category. They are part of Netznutzung

### Energy Tariffs
- High tariff (HT) and low tariff (NT): Separate line items
- Network usage: Split into DL_HT and DL_NT

### Fee Categorization
- Energy basic fee -> Geb_G
- Network basic fee -> DL_Geb

name: Stadt Zürich Elektrizitätswerk
customer_prompt:
## EWZ-Specific Instructions

- The invoices are in German

### Line Items
- Show line items seperate for each meter point. If a meter point has multiple line items, they should be listed separately.

sample table Meter Point 1:
| Netznutzung                         | Menge    | Preis in CHF   | MWST in %   | Betrag in CHF   |
|-------------------------------------|----------|----------------|-------------|-----------------|
| 01.02.2024 bis 29.02.2024 (29 Tage) |          |                |             |                 |
| Wirkenergie HT                      | 295 kWh  | 0.084500       | 8,1         | 24.93           |
| Wirkenergie NT                      | 46 kWh   | 0.052000       | 8,1         | 2.39            |
| Leistung HT                         | 4 kW     | 13.000000      | 8,1         | 52.00           |

sample table Meter Point 2:
| Netznutzung                         | Menge    | Preis in CHF   | MWST in %   | Betrag in CHF   |
|-------------------------------------|----------|----------------|-------------|-----------------|
| 01.02.2024 bis 29.02.2024 (29 Tage) |          |                |             |                 |
| Wirkenergie HT                      | 234 kWh  | 0.084500       | 8,1         | 19.77           |
| Wirkenergie NT                      | 23 kWh   | 0.052000       | 8,1         | 1.20            |
| Leistung HT                         | 1 kW     | 13.000000      | 8,1         | 13.00           |

GOOD:
- Line item 1 Meterpoint 1: Wirkenergie HT
- Line item 2 Meterpoint 1: Wirkenergie NT
- Line item 3 Meterpoint 1: Leistung HT
- Line item 1 Meterpoint 2: Wirkenergie HT
- Line item 2 Meterpoint 2: Wirkenergie NT
- Line item 3 Meterpoint 2: Leistung HT

name: IWB Industrielle Werke Basel
customer_prompt:
## IWB-Specific Instructions

- The invoices are in German
- city_zip and provider city_zip are in the format "City ZIP" (e.g., 4002, or 4002 Basel)
- Show the line items separately.

Sample table:
| Bezeichnung                | Dauer               | Faktor   | Preis pro Einheit   | Preis pro Einheit   | Menge     | Menge   | Betrag   |
|----------------------------|---------------------|----------|---------------------|---------------------|-----------|---------|----------|
| NNE Normaltarif Zone 1     | 01.05.23 - 31.05.23 |          | 8.40                | Rp                  | 4 167.00  | kWh     | 350.03   |
| NNE Normaltarif Zone 2     | 01.05.23 - 31.05.23 |          | 5.30                | Rp                  | 13 504.13 | kWh     | 715.72   |
| NNE Spartarif Zone 1       | 01.05.23 - 31.05.23 |          | 5.60                | Rp                  | 4 167.00  | kWh     | 233.35   |

GOOD:
- NNE Normaltarif Zone 1
- NNE Normaltarif Zone 2
- NNE Spartarif Zone 1

name: SERVICES INDUSTRIELS DE GENEVE
customer_prompt:
## SIG-Specific Instructions  

- The invoices are in French
- Line item addresses come from "Lieu de consommation"

When extracting data from a table like the one below, the top row must be ignored because it represents a summary, and the values in the child rows sum up to it. Only the child rows contain the detailed data that should be extracted.

Example table:

| Summary Row Example         |                 |           |           534.04 |            |
| Child Row 1                 | kWh 2'667.8     | 0.1395    |           372.16 | 8.1        |
| Child Row 2                 | kWh 1'704.0     | 0.0950    |           161.88 | 8.1        |

Expected behavior: Extract only the child rows, ignoring the summary row. But you must consider the description of the main row for the description of the child rows.

- Some line items only have a description and price - still include them. As long as it is not a summary of the following rows.

Something like this:

| Energie réactive                                                                                 |                 |           |            85.16 |            |
| Consommation - franchise                                                                         | kvarh 2'433.0   | 0.0350    |            85.16 | 8.1        |

Expected description: Energie réactive Consommation - franchise
